   20: 
   21: -module(tls_1_3_record_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   24: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   25: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_record.hrl").
   26: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake.hrl").
   27: -include_lib("ssl/src/tls_handshake_1_3.hrl").
   28: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_cipher.hrl").
   29: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_internal.hrl").
   30: 
   31: %% Callback functions
   32: -export([all/0,
   33:          init_per_suite/1,
   34:          end_per_suite/1]).
   35: 
   36: %% Testcases
   37: -export([encode_decode/0,
   38:          encode_decode/1,
   39:          finished_verify_data/0,
   40:          finished_verify_data/1,
   41:          '1_RTT_handshake'/0,
   42:          '1_RTT_handshake'/1,
   43:          '0_RTT_handshake'/0,
   44:          '0_RTT_handshake'/1
   45:         ]).
   46: 
   47: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   48: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   49: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   50: 
   51: all() ->
   52:     [encode_decode,
   53:      finished_verify_data,
   54:      '1_RTT_handshake',
   55:      '0_RTT_handshake'].
   56: 
   57: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   58:     catch crypto:stop(),
   59:     try (ok == crypto:start()) andalso ssl_test_lib:sufficient_crypto_support('tlsv1.3') of
   60: 	true ->
   61: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   62:             Config;
   63:         false ->
   64:             {skip, "Not enough crypto support for TLS-1.3"} 
   65:     catch _:_ ->
   66: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
   67:     end.
   68: 
   69: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   70:     ssl:stop(),
   71:     application:unload(ssl),
   72:     application:stop(crypto).
   73: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   74: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
   75: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   76: 
   77: encode_decode() ->
   78:      [{doc,"Test TLS 1.3 record encode/decode functions"}].
   79: 
   80: encode_decode(_Config) ->
   81:     ConnectionStates =
   82:         #{current_read =>
   83:               #{beast_mitigation => one_n_minus_one,
   84:                 cipher_state =>
   85:                     {cipher_state,
   86:                      <<14,172,111,243,199,170,242,203,126,205,34,93,122,115,226,14,
   87:                        15,117,155,48,24,112,61,15,113,208,127,51,179,227,194,232>>,
   88:                      <<197,54,168,218,54,91,157,58,30,201,197,142,51,58,53,231,228,
   89:                        131,57,122,170,78,82,196,30,48,23,16,95,255,185,236>>,
   90:                      undefined,undefined,undefined,16},
   91:                 client_verify_data => undefined,compression_state => undefined,
   92:                 mac_secret => undefined,secure_renegotiation => undefined,
   93:                 security_parameters =>
   94:                     #security_parameters{
   95:                        cipher_suite          = <<19,2>>,
   96:                        connection_end        = 0,
   97:                        bulk_cipher_algorithm = 8,
   98:                        cipher_type           = 2,
   99:                        prf_algorithm         = sha384,
  100:                        master_secret         =
  101:                            {handshake_secret,
  102:                             <<128,229,186,211,62,127,182,20,62,166,233,23,135,64,121,
  103:                               3,104,251,214,161,253,31,3,2,232,37,8,221,189,72,64,218,
  104:                               121,41,112,148,254,34,68,164,228,60,161,201,132,55,56,
  105:                               157>>},
  106:                        server_random         =
  107:                            <<92,24,205,75,244,60,136,212,250,32,214,20,37,3,213,87,61,207,
  108:                              147,61,168,145,177,118,160,153,33,53,48,108,191,174>>},
  109:                 sequence_number => 0,server_verify_data => undefined,
  110:                 pending_early_data_size => 0,
  111:                 trial_decryption => false,
  112:                 early_data_accepted => false},
  113:           current_write =>
  114:               #{beast_mitigation => one_n_minus_one,
  115:                 cipher_state =>
  116:                     {cipher_state,
  117:                      <<14,172,111,243,199,170,242,203,126,205,34,93,122,115,226,14,
  118:                        15,117,155,48,24,112,61,15,113,208,127,51,179,227,194,232>>,
  119:                      <<197,54,168,218,54,91,157,58,30,201,197,142,51,58,53,231,228,
  120:                        131,57,122,170,78,82,196,30,48,23,16,95,255,185,236>>,
  121:                      undefined,undefined,undefined,16},
  122:                 client_verify_data => undefined,compression_state => undefined,
  123:                 mac_secret => undefined,secure_renegotiation => undefined,
  124:                 security_parameters =>
  125:                     #security_parameters{
  126:                        cipher_suite          = <<19,2>>,
  127:                        connection_end        = 0,
  128:                        bulk_cipher_algorithm = 8,
  129:                        cipher_type           = 2,
  130:                        prf_algorithm         = sha384,
  131:                        master_secret         =
  132:                            {handshake_secret,
  133:                             <<128,229,186,211,62,127,182,20,62,166,233,23,135,64,121,
  134:                               3,104,251,214,161,253,31,3,2,232,37,8,221,189,72,64,218,
  135:                               121,41,112,148,254,34,68,164,228,60,161,201,132,55,56,
  136:                               157>>},
  137:                      server_random         =
  138:                            <<92,24,205,75,244,60,136,212,250,32,214,20,37,3,213,87,61,207,
  139:                              147,61,168,145,177,118,160,153,33,53,48,108,191,174>>},
  140:                 sequence_number => 0,server_verify_data => undefined},max_fragment_length => undefined},
  141: 
  142:     PlainText = [11,
  143:                  <<0,2,175>>,
  144:                  <<0,0,2,171,0,2,166,48,130,2,162,48,130,1,138,2,9,0,186,57,220,137,88,255,
  145:                    191,235,48,13,6,9,42,134,72,134,247,13,1,1,11,5,0,48,18,49,16,48,14,6,3,85,
  146:                    4,3,12,7,84,101,115,116,32,67,65,48,30,23,13,49,56,48,53,48,52,49,52,49,50,
  147:                    51,56,90,23,13,50,56,48,50,48,52,49,52,49,50,51,56,90,48,20,49,18,48,16,6,
  148:                    3,85,4,3,12,9,108,111,99,97,108,104,111,115,116,48,130,1,34,48,13,6,9,42,
  149:                    134,72,134,247,13,1,1,1,5,0,3,130,1,15,0,48,130,1,10,2,130,1,1,0,169,40,
  150:                    144,176,121,63,134,97,144,126,243,183,225,157,37,131,183,225,87,243,23,88,
  151:                    230,70,9,134,32,147,7,27,167,98,51,81,224,75,199,12,229,251,195,207,75,179,
  152:                    181,78,128,3,255,44,58,39,43,172,142,45,186,58,51,65,187,199,154,153,245,
  153:                    70,133,137,1,27,87,42,116,65,251,129,109,145,233,97,171,71,54,213,185,74,
  154:                    209,166,11,218,189,119,206,86,170,60,212,213,85,189,30,50,215,23,185,53,
  155:                    132,238,132,176,198,250,139,251,198,221,225,128,109,113,23,220,39,143,71,
  156:                    30,59,189,51,244,61,158,214,146,180,196,103,169,189,221,136,78,129,216,148,
  157:                    2,9,8,65,37,224,215,233,13,209,21,235,20,143,33,74,59,53,208,90,152,94,251,
  158:                    54,114,171,39,88,230,227,158,211,135,37,182,67,205,161,59,20,138,58,253,15,
  159:                    53,48,8,157,9,95,197,9,177,116,21,54,9,125,78,109,182,83,20,16,234,223,116,
  160:                    41,155,123,87,77,17,120,153,246,239,124,130,105,219,166,146,242,151,66,198,
  161:                    75,72,63,28,246,86,16,244,223,22,36,50,15,247,222,98,6,152,136,154,72,150,
  162:                    73,127,2,3,1,0,1,48,13,6,9,42,134,72,134,247,13,1,1,11,5,0,3,130,1,1,0,76,
  163:                    33,54,160,229,219,219,193,150,116,245,252,18,39,235,145,86,12,167,171,52,
  164:                    117,166,30,83,5,216,245,177,217,247,95,1,136,94,246,212,108,248,230,111,
  165:                    225,202,189,6,129,8,70,128,245,18,204,215,87,82,129,253,227,122,66,182,184,
  166:                    189,30,193,169,144,218,216,109,105,110,215,144,60,104,162,178,101,164,218,
  167:                    122,60,37,41,143,57,150,52,59,51,112,238,113,239,168,114,69,183,143,154,73,
  168:                    61,58,80,247,172,95,251,55,28,186,28,200,206,230,118,243,92,202,189,49,76,
  169:                    124,252,76,0,247,112,85,194,69,59,222,163,228,103,49,110,104,109,251,155,
  170:                    138,9,37,167,49,189,48,134,52,158,185,129,24,96,153,196,251,90,206,76,239,
  171:                    175,119,174,165,133,108,222,125,237,125,187,149,152,83,190,16,202,94,202,
  172:                    201,40,218,22,254,63,189,41,174,97,140,203,70,18,196,118,237,175,134,79,78,
  173:                    246,2,61,54,77,186,112,32,17,193,192,188,217,252,215,200,7,245,180,179,132,
  174:                    183,212,229,155,15,152,206,135,56,81,88,3,123,244,149,110,182,72,109,70,62,
  175:                    146,152,146,151,107,126,216,210,9,93,0,0>>],
  176: 
  177:     {[_Header|Encoded], _} = tls_record_1_3:encode_plain_text(22, PlainText, ConnectionStates),
  178:     CipherText = #ssl_tls{type = 23, version = ?TLS_1_2, fragment = Encoded},
  179: 
  180:     {#ssl_tls{type = 22, version = ?TLS_1_3, fragment = DecodedText}, _} =
  181:         tls_record_1_3:decode_cipher_text(CipherText, ConnectionStates),
  182: 
  183:     DecodedText = iolist_to_binary(PlainText),
  184:     ?CT_LOG("Decoded: ~p ~n", [DecodedText]),
  185:     ok.
  186: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  187: '1_RTT_handshake'() ->
  188:      [{doc,"Test TLS 1.3 1-RTT Handshake"}].
  189: 
  190: '1_RTT_handshake'(_Config) ->
  191:     %% ConnectionStates with NULL cipher
  192:     ConnStatesNull =
  193:        #{current_write =>
  194:              #{security_parameters =>
  195:                    #security_parameters{cipher_suite = ?TLS_NULL_WITH_NULL_NULL},
  196:                sequence_number => 0,
  197:                max_fragment_length => undefined
  198:               }
  199:         },
  200: 
  201:     %% {client}  construct a ClientHello handshake message:
  202:     %%
  203:     %%    ClientHello (196 octets):  01 00 00 c0 03 03 cb 34 ec b1 e7 81 63
  204:     %%       ba 1c 38 c6 da cb 19 6a 6d ff a2 1a 8d 99 12 ec 18 a2 ef 62 83
  205:     %%       02 4d ec e7 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00 00 91 00 00 00 0b
  206:     %%       00 09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01 00 00 0a 00 14 00
  207:     %%       12 00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02 01 03 01 04 00 23
  208:     %%       00 00 00 33 00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 99 38 1d e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2
  209:     %%       3d 8e 43 5a 7d ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d 54 13 69 1e 52 9a
  210:     %%       af 2c 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e 04 03 05 03 06 03
  211:     %%       02 03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02 01 04 02 05 02 06
  212:     %%       02 02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01
  213:     %%
  214:     %% {client}  send handshake record:
  215:     %%
  216:     %%    payload (196 octets):  01 00 00 c0 03 03 cb 34 ec b1 e7 81 63 ba
  217:     %%       1c 38 c6 da cb 19 6a 6d ff a2 1a 8d 99 12 ec 18 a2 ef 62 83 02
  218:     %%       4d ec e7 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00 00 91 00 00 00 0b 00
  219:     %%       09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01 00 00 0a 00 14 00 12
  220:     %%       00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02 01 03 01 04 00 23 00
  221:     %%       00 00 33 00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 99 38 1d e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2 3d
  222:     %%       8e 43 5a 7d ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d 54 13 69 1e 52 9a af
  223:     %%       2c 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e 04 03 05 03 06 03 02
  224:     %%       03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02 01 04 02 05 02 06 02
  225:     %%       02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01
  226:     %%
  227:     %%    complete record (201 octets):  16 03 01 00 c4 01 00 00 c0 03 03 cb
  228:     %%       34 ec b1 e7 81 63 ba 1c 38 c6 da cb 19 6a 6d ff a2 1a 8d 99 12
  229:     %%       ec 18 a2 ef 62 83 02 4d ec e7 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00
  230:     %%       00 91 00 00 00 0b 00 09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01
  231:     %%       00 00 0a 00 14 00 12 00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02
  232:     %%       01 03 01 04 00 23 00 00 00 33 00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 99 38 1d
  233:     %%       e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2 3d 8e 43 5a 7d ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d
  234:     %%       54 13 69 1e 52 9a af 2c 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e
  235:     %%       04 03 05 03 06 03 02 03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02
  236:     %%       01 04 02 05 02 06 02 02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01
  237:     ClientHello =
  238:         hexstr2bin("01 00 00 c0 03 03 cb 34 ec b1 e7 81 63
  239:           ba 1c 38 c6 da cb 19 6a 6d ff a2 1a 8d 99 12 ec 18 a2 ef 62 83
  240:           02 4d ec e7 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00 00 91 00 00 00 0b
  241:           00 09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01 00 00 0a 00 14 00
  242:           12 00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02 01 03 01 04 00 23
  243:           00 00 00 33 00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 99 38 1d e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2
  244:           3d 8e 43 5a 7d ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d 54 13 69 1e 52 9a
  245:           af 2c 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e 04 03 05 03 06 03
  246:           02 03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02 01 04 02 05 02 06
  247:           02 02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01"),
  248: 
  249:     ClientHelloRecord =
  250:         %% Current implementation always sets
  251:         %% legacy_record_version to Ox0303
  252:         hexstr2bin("16 03 03 00 c4 01 00 00 c0 03 03 cb
  253:           34 ec b1 e7 81 63 ba 1c 38 c6 da cb 19 6a 6d ff a2 1a 8d 99 12
  254:           ec 18 a2 ef 62 83 02 4d ec e7 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00
  255:           00 91 00 00 00 0b 00 09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01
  256:           00 00 0a 00 14 00 12 00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02
  257:           01 03 01 04 00 23 00 00 00 33 00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 99 38 1d
  258:           e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2 3d 8e 43 5a 7d ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d
  259:           54 13 69 1e 52 9a af 2c 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e
  260:           04 03 05 03 06 03 02 03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02
  261:           01 04 02 05 02 06 02 02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01"),
  262: 
  263:     {CHEncrypted, _} =
  264: 	tls_record:encode_handshake(ClientHello, ?TLS_1_3, ConnStatesNull),
  265:     ClientHelloRecord = iolist_to_binary(CHEncrypted),
  266: 
  267:     %% {server}  extract secret "early":
  268:     %%
  269:     %%    salt:  0 (all zero octets)
  270:     %%
  271:     %%    IKM (32 octets):  00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
  272:     %%                      00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
  273:     %%
  274:     %%    secret (32 octets):  33 ad 0a 1c 60 7e c0 3b 09 e6 cd 98 93 68 0c
  275:     %%       e2 10 ad f3 00 aa 1f 26 60 e1 b2 2e 10 f1 70 f9 2a
  276:     HKDFAlgo = sha256,
  277:     Salt = binary:copy(<<?BYTE(0)>>, 32),
  278:     _IKM = binary:copy(<<?BYTE(0)>>, 32),
  279:     EarlySecret =
  280:         hexstr2bin("33 ad 0a 1c 60 7e c0 3b 09 e6 cd 98 93 68 0c
  281:           e2 10 ad f3 00 aa 1f 26 60 e1 b2 2e 10 f1 70 f9 2a"),
  282: 
  283:     {early_secret, EarlySecret} = tls_v1:key_schedule(early_secret, HKDFAlgo, {psk, Salt}),
  284: 
  285:     %% {client}  create an ephemeral x25519 key pair:
  286:     %%
  287:     %%    private key (32 octets):  49 af 42 ba 7f 79 94 85 2d 71 3e f2 78
  288:     %%       4b cb ca a7 91 1d e2 6a dc 56 42 cb 63 45 40 e7 ea 50 05
  289:     %%
  290:     %%    public key (32 octets):  99 38 1d e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2 3d 8e 43 5a 7d
  291:     %%       ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d 54 13 69 1e 52 9a af 2c
  292:     CPublicKey =
  293:         hexstr2bin("99 38 1d e5 60 e4 bd 43 d2 3d 8e 43 5a 7d
  294:           ba fe b3 c0 6e 51 c1 3c ae 4d 54 13 69 1e 52 9a af 2c"),
  295: 
  296:     %% {server}  create an ephemeral x25519 key pair:
  297:     %%
  298:     %%   private key (32 octets):  b1 58 0e ea df 6d d5 89 b8 ef 4f 2d 56
  299:     %%      52 57 8c c8 10 e9 98 01 91 ec 8d 05 83 08 ce a2 16 a2 1e
  300:     %%
  301:     %%   public key (32 octets):  c9 82 88 76 11 20 95 fe 66 76 2b db f7 c6
  302:     %%      72 e1 56 d6 cc 25 3b 83 3d f1 dd 69 b1 b0 4e 75 1f 0f
  303:     SPrivateKey =
  304:         hexstr2bin("b1 58 0e ea df 6d d5 89 b8 ef 4f 2d 56
  305:          52 57 8c c8 10 e9 98 01 91 ec 8d 05 83 08 ce a2 16 a2 1e"),
  306: 
  307:     _SPublicKey =
  308:         hexstr2bin("c9 82 88 76 11 20 95 fe 66 76 2b db f7 c6
  309:          72 e1 56 d6 cc 25 3b 83 3d f1 dd 69 b1 b0 4e 75 1f 0f"),
  310: 
  311:     %% {server}  construct a ServerHello handshake message:
  312:     %%
  313:     %%    ServerHello (90 octets):  02 00 00 56 03 03 a6 af 06 a4 12 18 60
  314:     %%       dc 5e 6e 60 24 9c d3 4c 95 93 0c 8a c5 cb 14 34 da c1 55 77 2e
  315:     %%       d3 e2 69 28 00 13 01 00 00 2e 00 33 00 24 00 1d 00 20 c9 82 88
  316:     %%       76 11 20 95 fe 66 76 2b db f7 c6 72 e1 56 d6 cc 25 3b 83 3d f1
  317:     %%       dd 69 b1 b0 4e 75 1f 0f 00 2b 00 02 03 04
  318:     ServerHello =
  319:         hexstr2bin("02 00 00 56 03 03 a6 af 06 a4 12 18 60
  320:           dc 5e 6e 60 24 9c d3 4c 95 93 0c 8a c5 cb 14 34 da c1 55 77 2e
  321:           d3 e2 69 28 00 13 01 00 00 2e 00 33 00 24 00 1d 00 20 c9 82 88
  322:           76 11 20 95 fe 66 76 2b db f7 c6 72 e1 56 d6 cc 25 3b 83 3d f1
  323:           dd 69 b1 b0 4e 75 1f 0f 00 2b 00 02 03 04"),
  324: 
  325:     %% {server}  derive secret for handshake "tls13 derived":
  326:     %%
  327:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  33 ad 0a 1c 60 7e c0 3b 09 e6 cd 98 93 68 0c e2
  328:     %%       10 ad f3 00 aa 1f 26 60 e1 b2 2e 10 f1 70 f9 2a
  329:     %%
  330:     %%    hash (32 octets):  e3 b0 c4 42 98 fc 1c 14 9a fb f4 c8 99 6f b9 24
  331:     %%       27 ae 41 e4 64 9b 93 4c a4 95 99 1b 78 52 b8 55
  332:     %%
  333:     %%    info (49 octets):  00 20 0d 74 6c 73 31 33 20 64 65 72 69 76 65 64
  334:     %%       20 e3 b0 c4 42 98 fc 1c 14 9a fb f4 c8 99 6f b9 24 27 ae 41 e4
  335:     %%       64 9b 93 4c a4 95 99 1b 78 52 b8 55
  336:     %%
  337:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  6f 26 15 a1 08 c7 02 c5 67 8f 54 fc 9d ba
  338:     %%       b6 97 16 c0 76 18 9c 48 25 0c eb ea c3 57 6c 36 11 ba
  339:     Hash =
  340:         hexstr2bin("e3 b0 c4 42 98 fc 1c 14 9a fb f4 c8 99 6f b9 24
  341:           27 ae 41 e4 64 9b 93 4c a4 95 99 1b 78 52 b8 55"),
  342: 
  343:     Hash = crypto:hash(HKDFAlgo, <<>>),
  344: 
  345:     Info =
  346:         hexstr2bin("00 20 0d 74 6c 73 31 33 20 64 65 72 69 76 65 64
  347:           20 e3 b0 c4 42 98 fc 1c 14 9a fb f4 c8 99 6f b9 24 27 ae 41 e4
  348:           64 9b 93 4c a4 95 99 1b 78 52 b8 55"),
  349: 
  350:     Info = create_info(<<"derived">>, Hash,  ssl_cipher:hash_size(HKDFAlgo)),
  351: 
  352:     Expanded =
  353:         hexstr2bin("6f 26 15 a1 08 c7 02 c5 67 8f 54 fc 9d ba
  354:           b6 97 16 c0 76 18 9c 48 25 0c eb ea c3 57 6c 36 11 ba"),
  355: 
  356:     Expanded = tls_v1:derive_secret(EarlySecret, <<"derived">>, <<>>, HKDFAlgo),
  357: 
  358:     %% {server}  extract secret "handshake":
  359:     %%

  711:     CAPTInfo =
  712:         hexstr2bin("00 20 12 74 6c 73 31 33 20 63 20 61 70 20 74 72
  713:           61 66 66 69 63 20 96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b
  714:           1a 00 0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13"),
  715: 
  716:     CAPTrafficSecret =
  717:         hexstr2bin("9e 40 64 6c e7 9a 7f 9d c0 5a f8 88 9b ce
  718:           65 52 87 5a fa 0b 06 df 00 87 f7 92 eb b7 c1 75 04 a5"),
  719: 
  720:     CHSF = <<ClientHello/binary,
  721:              ServerHello/binary,
  722:              EncryptedExtensions/binary,
  723:              Certificate/binary,
  724:              CertificateVerify/binary,
  725:              FinishedHSBin/binary>>,
  726: 
  727:     CAPTHash = crypto:hash(HKDFAlgo, CHSF),
  728: 
  729:     CAPTInfo =
  730:         create_info(<<"c ap traffic">>, CAPTHash, ssl_cipher:hash_size(HKDFAlgo)),
  731: 
  732:     CAPTrafficSecret =
  733:         tls_v1:client_application_traffic_secret_0(HKDFAlgo, {master_secret, MasterSecret}, CHSF),
  734: 
  735:     %% {server}  derive secret "tls13 s ap traffic":
  736:     %%
  737:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  18 df 06 84 3d 13 a0 8b f2 a4 49 84 4c 5f 8a 47
  738:     %%       80 01 bc 4d 4c 62 79 84 d5 a4 1d a8 d0 40 29 19
  739:     %%
  740:     %%    hash (32 octets):  96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b 1a
  741:     %%       00 0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13
  742:     %%
  743:     %%    info (54 octets):  00 20 12 74 6c 73 31 33 20 73 20 61 70 20 74 72
  744:     %%       61 66 66 69 63 20 96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b
  745:     %%       1a 00 0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13
  746:     %%
  747:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  a1 1a f9 f0 55 31 f8 56 ad 47 11 6b 45 a9
  748:     %%       50 32 82 04 b4 f4 4b fb 6b 3a 4b 4f 1f 3f cb 63 16 43
  749: 
  750:     %% PRK = MasterSecret
  751:     %% hash = CAPTHash
  752:     SAPTInfo =
  753:         hexstr2bin(" 00 20 12 74 6c 73 31 33 20 73 20 61 70 20 74 72
  754:           61 66 66 69 63 20 96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b
  755:           1a 00 0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13"),
  756: 
  757:     SAPTrafficSecret =
  758:         hexstr2bin("a1 1a f9 f0 55 31 f8 56 ad 47 11 6b 45 a9
  759:           50 32 82 04 b4 f4 4b fb 6b 3a 4b 4f 1f 3f cb 63 16 43"),
  760: 
  761:     SAPTInfo =
  762:         create_info(<<"s ap traffic">>, CAPTHash, ssl_cipher:hash_size(HKDFAlgo)),
  763: 
  764:     SAPTrafficSecret =
  765:         tls_v1:server_application_traffic_secret_0(HKDFAlgo, {master_secret, MasterSecret}, CHSF),
  766: 
  767:     %% Resumption master secret from '0-RTT'
  768:     %%
  769:     %% {server}  generate resumption secret "tls13 resumption":
  770:     %%
  771:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41 b0 bf
  772:     %%       da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c
  773:     %%
  774:     _RMS = hexstr2bin("7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41 b0 bf
  775:                       da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c"),
  776: 
  777:     %% Verify calculation of resumption master secret that is used to create
  778:     %% the pre shared key in '0-RTT'.
  779:     _Temp = tls_v1:resumption_master_secret(HKDFAlgo, {master_secret, MasterSecret}, CHSF),
  780: 
  781:     %% {server}  derive secret "tls13 exp master":
  782:     %%
  783:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  18 df 06 84 3d 13 a0 8b f2 a4 49 84 4c 5f 8a 47
  784:     %%       80 01 bc 4d 4c 62 79 84 d5 a4 1d a8 d0 40 29 19
  785:     %%
  786:     %%    hash (32 octets):  96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b 1a
  787:     %%       00 0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13
  788:     %%
  789:     %%    info (52 octets):  00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 65 78 70 20 6d 61 73
  790:     %%       74 65 72 20 96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b 1a 00
  791:     %%       0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13
  792:     %%
  793:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  fe 22 f8 81 17 6e da 18 eb 8f 44 52 9e 67
  794:     %%       92 c5 0c 9a 3f 89 45 2f 68 d8 ae 31 1b 43 09 d3 cf 50
  795: 
  796:     %% PRK = MasterSecret
  797:     %% hash = CAPTHash
  798:     ExporterInfo =
  799:         hexstr2bin("00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 65 78 70 20 6d 61 73
  800:           74 65 72 20 96 08 10 2a 0f 1c cc 6d b6 25 0b 7b 7e 41 7b 1a 00
  801:           0e aa da 3d aa e4 77 7a 76 86 c9 ff 83 df 13"),
  802: 
  803:     ExporterMasterSecret =
  804:         hexstr2bin("fe 22 f8 81 17 6e da 18 eb 8f 44 52 9e 67
  805:           92 c5 0c 9a 3f 89 45 2f 68 d8 ae 31 1b 43 09 d3 cf 50"),
  806: 
  807:     ExporterInfo =
  808:         create_info(<<"exp master">>, CAPTHash, ssl_cipher:hash_size(HKDFAlgo)),
  809: 
  810:     ExporterMasterSecret =
  811:         tls_v1:exporter_master_secret(HKDFAlgo, {master_secret, MasterSecret}, CHSF),
  812: 
  813:     %% {server}  derive write traffic keys for application data:
  814:     %%
  815:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  a1 1a f9 f0 55 31 f8 56 ad 47 11 6b 45 a9 50 32
  816:     %%       82 04 b4 f4 4b fb 6b 3a 4b 4f 1f 3f cb 63 16 43
  817:     %%
  818:     %%    key info (13 octets):  00 10 09 74 6c 73 31 33 20 6b 65 79 00
  819:     %%
  820:     %%    key expanded (16 octets):  9f 02 28 3b 6c 9c 07 ef c2 6b b9 f2 ac
  821:     %%       92 e3 56
  822:     %%
  823:     %%    iv info (12 octets):  00 0c 08 74 6c 73 31 33 20 69 76 00
  824:     %%
  825:     %%    iv expanded (12 octets):  cf 78 2b 88 dd 83 54 9a ad f1 e9 84
  826: 
  827:     %% PRK = SAPTrafficsecret
  828:     %% key info = WriteKeyInfo
  829:     %% iv info = WriteIVInfo
  830:     SWKey =
  831:         hexstr2bin("9f 02 28 3b 6c 9c 07 ef c2 6b b9 f2 ac 92 e3 56"),
  832: 
  833:     SWIV =
  834:         hexstr2bin("cf 78 2b 88 dd 83 54 9a ad f1 e9 84"),
  835: 
  836:     {SWKey, SWIV} = tls_v1:calculate_traffic_keys(HKDFAlgo, KeyLength, SAPTrafficSecret),
  837: 
  838:     %% {server}  derive read traffic keys for handshake data:
  839:     %%
  840:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  b3 ed db 12 6e 06 7f 35 a7 80 b3 ab f4 5e 2d 8f
  841:     %%       3b 1a 95 07 38 f5 2e 96 00 74 6a 0e 27 a5 5a 21
  842:     %%
  843:     %%    key info (13 octets):  00 10 09 74 6c 73 31 33 20 6b 65 79 00
  844:     %%
  845:     %%    key expanded (16 octets):  db fa a6 93 d1 76 2c 5b 66 6a f5 d9 50
  846:     %%       25 8d 01
  847:     %%
  848:     %%    iv info (12 octets):  00 0c 08 74 6c 73 31 33 20 69 76 00
  849:     %%
  850:     %%    iv expanded (12 octets):  5b d3 c7 1b 83 6e 0b 76 bb 73 26 5f
  851: 
  852:     %% PRK = CHSTrafficsecret
  853:     %% key info = WriteKeyInfo
  854:     %% iv info = WrtieIVInfo
  855:     SRKey =
  856:         hexstr2bin("db fa a6 93 d1 76 2c 5b 66 6a f5 d9 50 25 8d 01"),
  857: 
  858:     SRIV =
  859:         hexstr2bin("5b d3 c7 1b 83 6e 0b 76 bb 73 26 5f"),
  860: 
  861:     {SRKey, SRIV} = tls_v1:calculate_traffic_keys(HKDFAlgo, KeyLength, CHSTrafficSecret),
  862: 
  863:     %% {client}  calculate finished "tls13 finished":
  864:     %%
  865:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  b3 ed db 12 6e 06 7f 35 a7 80 b3 ab f4 5e 2d 8f
  866:     %%       3b 1a 95 07 38 f5 2e 96 00 74 6a 0e 27 a5 5a 21
  867:     %%
  868:     %%    hash (0 octets):  (empty)
  869:     %%
  870:     %%    info (18 octets):  00 20 0e 74 6c 73 31 33 20 66 69 6e 69 73 68 65
  871:     %%       64 00
  872:     %%
  873:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  b8 0a d0 10 15 fb 2f 0b d6 5f f7 d4 da 5d
  874:     %%       6b f8 3f 84 82 1d 1f 87 fd c7 d3 c7 5b 5a 7b 42 d9 c4
  875:     %%
  876:     %%    finished (32 octets):  a8 ec 43 6d 67 76 34 ae 52 5a c1 fc eb e1
  877:     %%       1a 03 9e c1 76 94 fa c6 e9 85 27 b6 42 f2 ed d5 ce 61
  878: 
  879:     %% PRK = CHSTrafficsecret
  880:     %% info = FInfo
  881:     CFExpanded =
  882:         hexstr2bin("b8 0a d0 10 15 fb 2f 0b d6 5f f7 d4 da 5d
  883:         6b f8 3f 84 82 1d 1f 87 fd c7 d3 c7 5b 5a 7b 42 d9 c4"),
  884: 
  885:     CFinishedVerifyData =
  886:         hexstr2bin("a8 ec 43 6d 67 76 34 ae 52 5a c1 fc eb e1
  887:         1a 03 9e c1 76 94 fa c6 e9 85 27 b6 42 f2 ed d5 ce 61"),
  888: 
  889:     MessageHistory1 = [FinishedHSBin,
  890:                        CertificateVerify,
  891:                        Certificate,
  892:                        EncryptedExtensions,
  893:                        ServerHello,
  894:                        ClientHello],
  895: 
  896:     CFExpanded = tls_v1:finished_key(CHSTrafficSecret, HKDFAlgo),
  897:     CFinishedVerifyData = tls_v1:finished_verify_data(CFExpanded, HKDFAlgo, MessageHistory1),
  898: 
  899:     %% {client}  construct a Finished handshake message:
  900:     %%
  901:     %%    Finished (36 octets):  14 00 00 20 a8 ec 43 6d 67 76 34 ae 52 5a
  902:     %%       c1 fc eb e1 1a 03 9e c1 76 94 fa c6 e9 85 27 b6 42 f2 ed d5 ce
  903:     %%       61
  904:     CFinishedBin =
  905:         hexstr2bin("14 00 00 20 a8 ec 43 6d 67 76 34 ae 52 5a
  906:           c1 fc eb e1 1a 03 9e c1 76 94 fa c6 e9 85 27 b6 42 f2 ed d5 ce
  907:           61"),
  908: 
  909:     CFinished = #finished{verify_data = CFinishedVerifyData},
  910: 
  911:     CFinishedIOList = tls_handshake:encode_handshake(CFinished, ?TLS_1_3),
  912:     CFinishedBin = iolist_to_binary(CFinishedIOList),
  913: 
  914:     %% {client}  derive write traffic keys for application data:
  915:     %%
  916:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  9e 40 64 6c e7 9a 7f 9d c0 5a f8 88 9b ce 65 52
  917:     %%       87 5a fa 0b 06 df 00 87 f7 92 eb b7 c1 75 04 a5
  918:     %%
  919:     %%    key info (13 octets):  00 10 09 74 6c 73 31 33 20 6b 65 79 00
  920:     %%
  921:     %%    key expanded (16 octets):  17 42 2d da 59 6e d5 d9 ac d8 90 e3 c6
  922:     %%       3f 50 51
  923:     %%
  924:     %%    iv info (12 octets):  00 0c 08 74 6c 73 31 33 20 69 76 00
  925:     %%
  926:     %%    iv expanded (12 octets):  5b 78 92 3d ee 08 57 90 33 e5 23 d9
  927: 
  928:     %% PRK = CAPTrafficsecret
  929:     %% key info = WriteKeyInfo
  930:     %% iv info = WriteIVInfo
  931: 
  932:     CWKey =
  933:         hexstr2bin("17 42 2d da 59 6e d5 d9 ac d8 90 e3 c6 3f 50 51"),
  934: 
  935:     CWIV =
  936:         hexstr2bin("5b 78 92 3d ee 08 57 90 33 e5 23 d9"),
  937: 
  938:     {CWKey, CWIV} = tls_v1:calculate_traffic_keys(HKDFAlgo, KeyLength, CAPTrafficSecret),
  939: 
  940:     %% {client}  derive secret "tls13 res master":
  941:     %%
  942:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  18 df 06 84 3d 13 a0 8b f2 a4 49 84 4c 5f 8a 47
  943:     %%       80 01 bc 4d 4c 62 79 84 d5 a4 1d a8 d0 40 29 19
  944:     %%
  945:     %%    hash (32 octets):  20 91 45 a9 6e e8 e2 a1 22 ff 81 00 47 cc 95 26
  946:     %%       84 65 8d 60 49 e8 64 29 42 6d b8 7c 54 ad 14 3d
  947:     %%
  948:     %%    info (52 octets):  00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 72 65 73 20 6d 61 73
  949:     %%       74 65 72 20 20 91 45 a9 6e e8 e2 a1 22 ff 81 00 47 cc 95 26 84
  950:     %%       65 8d 60 49 e8 64 29 42 6d b8 7c 54 ad 14 3d
  951:     %%
  952:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41
  953:     %%       b0 bf da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c
  954: 
  955:     %% PRK = MasterSecret
  956: 
  957:     CRMHash = hexstr2bin("20 91 45 a9 6e e8 e2 a1 22 ff 81 00 47 cc 95 26
  958:                           84 65 8d 60 49 e8 64 29 42 6d b8 7c 54 ad 14 3d"),
  959: 
  960:     CRMInfo = hexstr2bin(" 00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 72 65 73 20 6d 61 73
  961:             74 65 72 20 20 91 45 a9 6e e8 e2 a1 22 ff 81 00 47 cc 95 26 84
  962:             65 8d 60 49 e8 64 29 42 6d b8 7c 54 ad 14 3d"),
  963: 
  964:     ResumptionMasterSecret = hexstr2bin("7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41
  965:                              b0 bf da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c"),
  966: 
  967:     CHCF = <<ClientHello/binary,
  968:              ServerHello/binary,
  969:              EncryptedExtensions/binary,
  970:              Certificate/binary,
  971:              CertificateVerify/binary,
  972:              FinishedHSBin/binary,
  973:              CFinishedBin/binary>>,
  974: 
  975:     MessageHistory3 = [ClientHello,
  976:                        ServerHello,
  977:                        EncryptedExtensions,
  978:                        Certificate,
  979:                        CertificateVerify,
  980:                        FinishedHSBin,
  981:                        CFinishedBin
  982:                        ],
  983: 
  984:     CRMHash = crypto:hash(HKDFAlgo, CHCF),
  985: 
  986:     CRMInfo =
  987:         create_info(<<"res master">>, CRMHash, ssl_cipher:hash_size(HKDFAlgo)),
  988: 
  989:     ResumptionMasterSecret =
  990:         tls_v1:resumption_master_secret(HKDFAlgo, {master_secret, MasterSecret}, MessageHistory3),
  991:     ok.
  992: 
  993: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  994: '0_RTT_handshake'() ->
  995:      [{doc,"Test TLS 1.3 0-RTT Handshake"}].
  996: 
  997: '0_RTT_handshake'(_Config) ->
  998:     HKDFAlgo = sha256,
  999: 
 1000:     %% {server}  generate resumption secret "tls13 resumption":
 1001:     %%
 1002:     %%    PRK (32 octets):  7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41 b0 bf
 1003:     %%       da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c
 1004:     %%
 1005:     %%    hash (2 octets):  00 00
 1006:     %%
 1007:     %%    info (22 octets):  00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 72 65 73 75 6d 70 74
 1008:     %%       69 6f 6e 02 00 00
 1009:     %%
 1010:     %%    expanded (32 octets):  4e cd 0e b6 ec 3b 4d 87 f5 d6 02 8f 92 2c
 1011:     %%       a4 c5 85 1a 27 7f d4 13 11 c9 e6 2d 2c 94 92 e1 c4 f3
 1012:     %%
 1013:     %% {server}  construct a NewSessionTicket handshake message:
 1014:     %%
 1015:     %%    NewSessionTicket (205 octets):  04 00 00 c9 00 00 00 1e fa d6 aa
 1016:     %%       c5 02 00 00 00 b2 2c 03 5d 82 93 59 ee 5f f7 af 4e c9 00 00 00
 1017:     %%       00 26 2a 64 94 dc 48 6d 2c 8a 34 cb 33 fa 90 bf 1b 00 70 ad 3c
 1018:     %%       49 88 83 c9 36 7c 09 a2 be 78 5a bc 55 cd 22 60 97 a3 a9 82 11
 1019:     %%       72 83 f8 2a 03 a1 43 ef d3 ff 5d d3 6d 64 e8 61 be 7f d6 1d 28
 1020:     %%       27 db 27 9c ce 14 50 77 d4 54 a3 66 4d 4e 6d a4 d2 9e e0 37 25
 1021:     %%       a6 a4 da fc d0 fc 67 d2 ae a7 05 29 51 3e 3d a2 67 7f a5 90 6c
 1022:     %%       5b 3f 7d 8f 92 f2 28 bd a4 0d da 72 14 70 f9 fb f2 97 b5 ae a6
 1023:     %%       17 64 6f ac 5c 03 27 2e 97 07 27 c6 21 a7 91 41 ef 5f 7d e6 50
 1024:     %%       5e 5b fb c3 88 e9 33 43 69 40 93 93 4a e4 d3 57 00 08 00 2a 00
 1025:     %%       04 00 00 04 00
 1026:     ResPRK =
 1027:         hexstr2bin("7d f2 35 f2 03 1d 2a 05 12 87 d0 2b 02 41 b0 bf
 1028:                     da f8 6c c8 56 23 1f 2d 5a ba 46 c4 34 ec 19 6c"),
 1029: 
 1030:     _ResHash = hexstr2bin("00 00"),
 1031: 
 1032:     _ResInfo = hexstr2bin("00 20 10 74 6c 73 31 33 20 72 65 73 75 6d 70 74
 1033:                            69 6f 6e 02 00 00"),
 1034: 
 1035:     ResExpanded =
 1036:         hexstr2bin("4e cd 0e b6 ec 3b 4d 87 f5 d6 02 8f 92 2c
 1037:         a4 c5 85 1a 27 7f d4 13 11 c9 e6 2d 2c 94 92 e1 c4 f3"),
 1038: 
 1039:     NewSessionTicket =
 1040:         hexstr2bin("04 00 00 c9 00 00 00 1e fa d6 aa
 1041:           c5 02 00 00 00 b2 2c 03 5d 82 93 59 ee 5f f7 af 4e c9 00 00 00
 1042:           00 26 2a 64 94 dc 48 6d 2c 8a 34 cb 33 fa 90 bf 1b 00 70 ad 3c
 1043:           49 88 83 c9 36 7c 09 a2 be 78 5a bc 55 cd 22 60 97 a3 a9 82 11
 1044:           72 83 f8 2a 03 a1 43 ef d3 ff 5d d3 6d 64 e8 61 be 7f d6 1d 28
 1045:           27 db 27 9c ce 14 50 77 d4 54 a3 66 4d 4e 6d a4 d2 9e e0 37 25
 1046:           a6 a4 da fc d0 fc 67 d2 ae a7 05 29 51 3e 3d a2 67 7f a5 90 6c
 1047:           5b 3f 7d 8f 92 f2 28 bd a4 0d da 72 14 70 f9 fb f2 97 b5 ae a6
 1048:           17 64 6f ac 5c 03 27 2e 97 07 27 c6 21 a7 91 41 ef 5f 7d e6 50
 1049:           5e 5b fb c3 88 e9 33 43 69 40 93 93 4a e4 d3 57 00 08 00 2a 00
 1050:           04 00 00 04 00"),
 1051:     <<?BYTE(NWT), ?UINT24(_), TicketBody/binary>> = NewSessionTicket,
 1052:     #new_session_ticket{
 1053:        ticket_lifetime = _LifeTime,
 1054:        ticket_age_add = _AgeAdd,
 1055:        ticket_nonce = Nonce,
 1056:        ticket = Ticket,
 1057:        extensions = _Extensions
 1058:       } = tls_handshake:decode_handshake(?TLS_1_3, NWT, TicketBody),
 1059: 
 1060:     %% ResPRK = resumption master secret
 1061:     ResExpanded = tls_v1:pre_shared_key(ResPRK, Nonce, HKDFAlgo),
 1062: 
 1063:     %% {client}  create an ephemeral x25519 key pair:
 1064:     %%
 1065:     %%    private key (32 octets):  bf f9 11 88 28 38 46 dd 6a 21 34 ef 71
 1066:     %%       80 ca 2b 0b 14 fb 10 dc e7 07 b5 09 8c 0d dd c8 13 b2 df
 1067:     %%
 1068:     %%    public key (32 octets):  e4 ff b6 8a c0 5f 8d 96 c9 9d a2 66 98 34
 1069:     %%       6c 6b e1 64 82 ba dd da fe 05 1a 66 b4 f1 8d 66 8f 0b
 1070:     %%
 1071:     %% {client}  extract secret "early":
 1072:     %%
 1073:     %%    salt:  0 (all zero octets)
 1074:     %%
 1075:     %%    IKM (32 octets):  4e cd 0e b6 ec 3b 4d 87 f5 d6 02 8f 92 2c a4 c5
 1076:     %%       85 1a 27 7f d4 13 11 c9 e6 2d 2c 94 92 e1 c4 f3
 1077:     %%
 1078:     %%    secret (32 octets):  9b 21 88 e9 b2 fc 6d 64 d7 1d c3 29 90 0e 20
 1079:     %%       bb 41 91 50 00 f6 78 aa 83 9c bb 79 7c b7 d8 33 2c
 1080:     %%
 1081: 
 1082:     PSK = hexstr2bin("4e cd 0e b6 ec 3b 4d 87 f5 d6 02 8f 92 2c a4 c5
 1083:                       85 1a 27 7f d4 13 11 c9 e6 2d 2c 94 92 e1 c4 f3"),
 1084:     PSK = ResExpanded,
 1085:     EarlySecret = hexstr2bin("9b 21 88 e9 b2 fc 6d 64 d7 1d c3 29 90 0e 20
 1086:                       bb 41 91 50 00 f6 78 aa 83 9c bb 79 7c b7 d8 33 2c"),
 1087: 
 1088:     {early_secret, EarlySecret} = tls_v1:key_schedule(early_secret, HKDFAlgo, {psk, PSK}),
 1089: 
 1090:     %% {client}  construct a ClientHello handshake message:
 1091:     %%
 1092:     %%    ClientHello (477 octets):  01 00 01 fc 03 03 1b c3 ce b6 bb e3 9c
 1093:     %%       ff 93 83 55 b5 a5 0a db 6d b2 1b 7a 6a f6 49 d7 b4 bc 41 9d 78
 1094:     %%       76 48 7d 95 00 00 06 13 01 13 03 13 02 01 00 01 cd 00 00 00 0b
 1095:     %%       00 09 00 00 06 73 65 72 76 65 72 ff 01 00 01 00 00 0a 00 14 00
 1096:     %%       12 00 1d 00 17 00 18 00 19 01 00 01 01 01 02 01 03 01 04 00 33
 1097:     %%       00 26 00 24 00 1d 00 20 e4 ff b6 8a c0 5f 8d 96 c9 9d a2 66 98
 1098:     %%       34 6c 6b e1 64 82 ba dd da fe 05 1a 66 b4 f1 8d 66 8f 0b 00 2a
 1099:     %%       00 00 00 2b 00 03 02 03 04 00 0d 00 20 00 1e 04 03 05 03 06 03
 1100:     %%       02 03 08 04 08 05 08 06 04 01 05 01 06 01 02 01 04 02 05 02 06
 1101:     %%       02 02 02 00 2d 00 02 01 01 00 1c 00 02 40 01 00 15 00 57 00 00
 1102:     %%       00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 1103:     %%       00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 1104:     %%       00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 1105:     %%       00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00 00
 1106:     %%       00 00 29 00 dd 00 b8 00 b2 2c 03 5d 82 93 59 ee 5f f7 af 4e c9
 1107:     %%       00 00 00 00 26 2a 64 94 dc 48 6d 2c 8a 34 cb 33 fa 90 bf 1b 00

 1402:                     02 d2 9c bd ad b7 25 12  db 9c ec 2e 5e 1d 00 e5
 1403:                     0c af cf 6f 21 09 1e bc  4f 25 3c 5e ab 01 a6 79
 1404:                     ba ea be ed b9 c9 61 8f  66 00 6b 82 44 d6 62 2a
 1405:                     aa 56 88 7c cf c6 6a 0f  38 51 df a1 3a 78 cf f7
 1406:                     99 1e 03 cb 2c 3a 0e d8  7d 73 67 36 2e b7 80 5b
 1407:                     00 b2 52 4f f2 98 a4 da  48 7c ac de af 8a 23 36
 1408:                     c5 63 1b 3e fa 93 5b b4  11 e7 53 ca 13 b0 15 fe
 1409:                     c7 e4 a7 30 f1 36 9f 9e"),
 1410: 
 1411:     BaseKey =
 1412:         hexstr2bin("a2 06 72 65 e7 f0 65 2a  92 3d 5d 72 ab 04 67 c4
 1413:                     61 32 ee b9 68 b6 a3 2d  31 1c 80 58 68 54 88 14"),
 1414: 
 1415:     VerifyData =
 1416:         hexstr2bin("ea 6e e1 76 dc cc 4a f1  85 9e 9e 4e 93 f7 97 ea
 1417:                     c9 a7 8c e4 39 30 1e 35  27 5a d4 3f 3c dd bd e3"),
 1418: 
 1419:     Messages = [CertificateVerify,
 1420:                 Certificate,
 1421:                 EncryptedExtensions,
 1422:                 ServerHello,
 1423:                 ClientHello],
 1424: 
 1425:     FinishedKey = tls_v1:finished_key(BaseKey, sha256),
 1426:     VerifyData = tls_v1:finished_verify_data(FinishedKey, sha256, Messages).
 1427: 
 1428: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1429: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
 1430: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
 1431: 
 1432: hexstr2int(S) ->
 1433:     B = hexstr2bin(S),
 1434:     Bits = byte_size(B) * 8,
 1435:     <<Integer:Bits/integer>> = B,
 1436:     Integer.
 1437: 
 1438: hexstr2bin(S) when is_binary(S) ->
 1439:     hexstr2bin(S, <<>>);
 1440: hexstr2bin(S) ->
 1441:     hexstr2bin(list_to_binary(S), <<>>).
 1442: %%
 1443: hexstr2bin(<<>>, Acc) ->
 1444:     Acc;
 1445: hexstr2bin(<<C,T/binary>>, Acc) when C =:= 32;   %% SPACE
 1446:                                      C =:= 10;   %% LF
 1447:                                      C =:= 13 -> %% CR
 1448:     hexstr2bin(T, Acc);
 1449: hexstr2bin(<<X,Y,T/binary>>, Acc) ->
 1450:     I = hex2int(X) * 16 + hex2int(Y),
 1451:     hexstr2bin(T, <<Acc/binary,I>>).
 1452: 
 1453: hex2int(C) when $0 =< C, C =< $9 ->
 1454:     C - $0;
 1455: hex2int(C) when $A =< C, C =< $F ->
 1456:     C - $A + 10;
 1457: hex2int(C) when $a =< C, C =< $f ->
 1458:     C - $a + 10.
 1459: 
 1460: create_info(Label, Context, Length) ->
 1461:     tls_v1:create_info(Label, Context, Length, << "tls13 ">>).
